metadata.scenario_prompt:
Generate chatbot questions from users contacting their insurance company about their coverage. 
Include these customer types:
- Frustrated customers (angry about rates, claim denials, poor service)
- Confused customers (need simple explanations, don't understand terms)
- Urgent customers (immediate needs like accidents, claims, proof of insurance)
- Normal customers (routine inquiries, policy changes, general questions)

Include these complexity levels:
- Simple: Basic questions that can be answered directly
- Medium: Questions requiring some explanation or context
- Complex: Multi-part questions or situations requiring detailed responses

Make the questions realistic and diverse.

questions.question: Why did my premium increase by $200? This is ridiculous - I haven't had any claims!
I just had a car accident. What do I need to do right now?
Can someone explain what a deductible is? I keep seeing this word but don't understand.
How do I add my teenage daughter to my auto policy?
I've been a customer for 15 years and you denied my claim? I want to speak to a supervisor immediately!
What's the difference between comprehensive and collision coverage? I'm trying to decide what I need.
My house just flooded - I need emergency assistance. Does my policy cover temporary housing?
Can I get proof of insurance sent to my phone? I got pulled over and need it ASAP.
How do I update my billing information?
What exactly is an 'act of God' and why isn't my damage covered under it?
I've been on hold for 45 minutes and keep getting disconnected. Fix this or I'm switching companies!
My neighbor's tree fell on my garage during the storm. Which insurance handles this - mine or theirs?
Can I schedule a review of my current coverage? I think I might be paying for things I don't need.
Someone broke into my car last night. I need to file a claim and get a rental car - how do I do this?
Why am I paying more than my friend for the same coverage? We have identical cars!
What documents do I need to submit for my water damage claim?
I don't understand all these terms in my policy renewal - can you explain them in simple English?
My windshield cracked on the highway. Is this covered and how quickly can it be fixed?
I've been trying to file a claim online for hours but keep getting errors. This is unacceptable!
When does my policy expire and how do I renew it?
